page.title: 05Entertainment Pubs and Inns
page.content: In our rectangle there are 5 pubs. The Bull Inn was built in 1301. The maximum people that can stay is 14. There is a design on the wall that was made in Jacobean times. There are some pudding stones which were markers for the ancient Britons. The Bull used to be a coaching inn. I don't know how old the Carpenters Arms is but it was there in 1882. The carpark used to be a garden and a pig sty. The White Hart The White Hart is a hotel and was built in 1600. It has a restaurant and a garden.The other two pubs are called The Five Horse Shoes and the Sun.
